alert.note: Alert for Clay; Quitman (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clay, west central Randolph and southeastern Quitman Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Fort Gaines, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Days Crossroads, Springvale Station, Standleys Store, Watson Crossroads, Peterson Hill, Coles, Moores Crossroads, Crossroads, Ricks Place, Garnersville, Bagby State Park, Hatcher, Morris, Bethel and Cotton Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
